lead_paragraph: The third and fourth rounds were going on at the same time and with different rules. There was so much rain that there was a worker with a squeegee positioned near every green. The final putts were made in what some would call the dark. There was no re-pairing after the third round and the greens weren't even rolled, let along cut. Oh yeah, on Friday they put the cup on No. 10 in the wrong place.

headline.print_headline: This PGA Championship Was an Odd Ball
headline.main: This PGA Championship Was an Odd Ball
